attributes.action: Polocies for people, via electronic vote on laws and polocies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A vote every 4 years does not make our elected representitives truly ACCOUNTABLE!

A vote of confidence should be required (infact it should be mandertory) by public vote to pass:
1. all laws 
2. go to war
3. enforce new charges (congestion charge etc,)
4. public should be able to bring new laws in for discussion, and public vote by means of representation by lobbying there MP. 

If they can vote for pop idol, why not for polocy using electronic media using ubique ID such as national insurance number.

Poloticians talk about choice and voter apperthy, Make polotics empower people by getting the people to dictate law.
